parameters.name: Description
parameters.description: The description of the route entry. The description must be 1 to 256 characters in length and cannot start with http:// or https://.

parameters.name: RouteEntryId
parameters.description: The ID of the custom route.

parameters.name: RouteEntryName
parameters.description:
The name of the route.

The name must be 1 to 128 characters in length and cannot start with `http://` or `https://`.
